snippet.title: Hollow Home — Official Teaser Trailer | The Last Day of Childhood
snippet.description:
Hollow Home is an isometric narrative RPG for PC and consoles about the russian invasion of Ukraine. Experience the horrors of war through the eyes of a teenager trapped inside an occupied city. Learn survival skills, build relationships, and face tough choices as each passing day brings new tragedies and destruction to your childhood home.

"The Last Day of Childhood" teaser trailer showcases in-development gameplay and sets up the last peaceful day of the game’s unique cast of characters – before their lives are forever changed by the sound of an air raid alert.

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2362070/Hollow_Home/

Stay up to date with development news:
https://twitter.com/HollowHomeGame
